info.title: Codat Expense API
info.description:
The API for Sync for Expenses.
Sync for Expenses is an API and a set of supporting tools. It has been built to enable corporate card and expense management platforms to provide high-quality integrations with multiple accounting platforms through a standardized API.

[Read more...](https://docs.codat.io/sync-for-expenses/overview)

[See our OpenAPI spec](https://github.com/codatio/oas)

tags.name: Mapping Options
tags.description: Mapping options for a companies expenses.

tags.name: Sync
tags.description: Triggering a new sync of expenses to accounting software.

tags.name: Sync Status
tags.description: Check the status of ongoing or previous expense syncs.

tags.name: Expenses
tags.description: Create expense datasets and upload receipts.

tags.name: Transaction Status
tags.description: Retrieve the status of transactions within a sync.

parameters.name: transactionId

schema.description: Unique identifier for your SMB in Codat.

id.description: Your unique idenfier for the transaction.

issueDate.description: Date of the transaction was recorded.

currency.description: Currency the transaction was recorded in.

currencyRate.title: CurrencyRate
currencyRate.description:
Rate to convert the total amount of the payment into the base currency for the company at the time of the payment.

Currency rates in Codat are implemented as the multiple of foreign currency units to each base currency unit.  

Where the currency rate is provided by the underlying accounting platform, it will be available from Codat with the same precision (up to a maximum of 9 decimal places). 

For accounting platforms which do not provide an explicit currency rate, it is calculated as `baseCurrency / foreignCurrency` and will be returned to 9 decimal places.

## Examples with base currency of GBP

| Foreign Currency | Foreign Amount | Currency Rate | Base Currency Amount (GBP) |
| :--------------- | :------------- | :------------ | :------------------------- |
| **USD**          | $20            | 0.781         | 15.62                     |
| **EUR**          | 20            | 0.885         | 17.70                     |
| **RUB**          | 20            | 0.011         | 0.22                      |

## Examples with base currency of USD

| Foreign Currency | Foreign Amount | Currency Rate | Base Currency Amount (USD) |
| :--------------- | :------------- | :------------ | :------------------------- |
| **GBP**          | 20            | 1.277         | $25.54                     |
| **EUR**          | 20            | 1.134         | $22.68                     |
| **RUB**          | 20            | 0.015         | $0.30                      |
